name: Self Care Game
description:
Self Care Game is, obviously, a game about self-care.

Play it when you are stressed! (I can't guarantee that it'll make you feel calm tho...) The game is set up similar to an escape room. 

1st Room: Yours

- You need to feed the cat and find the meal (cup with bread)

- Explore different sprites for self-care tips

2nd Room: School

- Find the friend and say hi in order to exit

- Keep exploring different sprites. 

3rd Room: Maze

- Exit at bottom right

- You don't need all the stars to exit

4th Room: Secret

- You'll know when you play

5th Room: Secret

- You need to find the invisible exit (hint: it's not on the edges/sides)
